channel.title: Donator Sign Only showing for the donator

item.title: Donator Sign Only showing for the donator
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fix it client sided not server sided:
Insanely good tutorial here: http:// www.rune - server.org / runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/348200-adding-custom-ranks.html (remove spaces)
The owner doesn’t want it released on this site but it’s still a good one.

item.title: Donator Sign Only showing for the donator
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“axecutor9090, post:1, topic:429450”]Having a issues that i comfirmed…

The donator sign is only showing up to the donator and not to other players, any solutions, no client changes were taking place, everyone client is original.

[code]
// mod/admin level crown fix -bakatool
if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0){
out.write(7);
}else
if (playerRights == 3)
out.write(2);
else
out.write(playerRights);

			out.write(0); // no log
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {
			// error at finalizer means auto destruct no exceptions
			// -bakatool
			disconnected = true;
			destruct();
		}
	}

[/code][/quote]

The other clients might not know to show a donator icon.

Read full topic
item.source: Donator Sign Only showing for the donator

item.title: Donator Sign Only showing for the donator
item.dc:creator: @axecutor9090 axecutor9090
item.description:
@axecutor9090 wrote:

Having a issues that i comfirmed…

The donator sign is only showing up to the donator and not to other players, any solutions, no client changes were taking place, everyone client is original.

				// mod/admin level crown fix -bakatool
				if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0){
				out.write(7);
				}else
				if (playerRights == 3)
					out.write(2);
				else
					out.write(playerRights);

				out.write(0); // no log
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {
				// error at finalizer means auto destruct no exceptions
				// -bakatool
				disconnected = true;
				destruct();
			}
		}

Read full topic
